tool_description: The fastest Soccer Jackpots and predictions Data API, Our APIs allows user to access 99.9% of available Soccer Jackpots data and predictions. We covering Soccer Jackpots in Sub-Saharan Africa and various international Soccer Jackpots.
name: Soccer Jackpots API
title: Soccer Jackpots API

api_list.name: Load Soccer Jackpots
api_list.description: Load Soccer Jackpot fixtures, prediction and match winner opening odds for a particular date.

optional_parameters.name: status
optional_parameters.description:
The current status of a the Soccer Jackpot
jackpot_pending - The Soccer Jackpot has not started.
jackpot_settled - The given Soccer Jackpot has all fixtures completed and final result determined, Incase a game is postponed the Jackpot will be settled with the remaining games taken into account.

api_list.name: Load Jackpot categories
api_list.description: Load available Soccer Jackpot categories from the API.

api_list.name: Load Soccer Jackpot by Id
api_list.description: Load a particular Soccer Jackpot from API by its ID.

api_list.name: Load away team previous Fixtures
api_list.description: Load previous fixtures for the away team of a given fixture.

api_list.name: Load Jackpot Fixture by Id
api_list.description: Load a particular fixture from API by its Id

api_list.name: Load Odds feed for Fixture
api_list.description: Load multiple current odds feed for a given fixture from different providers.

api_list.name: Load Jackpot Category by Id
api_list.description: Load Soccer Jackpot category from API by Id

api_list.name: Load Jackpot Fixtures H2H
api_list.description: Load H2H data for a given fixture.

api_list.name: Load home team previous Fixtures
api_list.description: Load previous fixtures for the home team of a given fixture.

api_list.name: Load Jackpot Fixtures as predictions
api_list.description: Load all fixtures for available Soccer Jackpots for a given date, this would be for use as predictions instead of Soccer Jackpots.

optional_parameters.name: fixture_status
optional_parameters.description:
The status of a given fixture, below are all available fixture status on the API.
Not_Started - Fixtures Scheduled but not started.
Time_To_Be_Defined - Scheduled but date and time are not known.
Halftime - Halftime Finished in the regular time.
First_Half - First half in play.
Second_Half - Second half in play.
Extra_Time - Extra time in play.
Break_Time - Break during extra time.
Penalty_In_Progress - Penalty played after extra time.
Match_Suspended - Suspended by referee's decision, may be rescheduled another day.
Match_Interrupted - Interrupted by referee's decision, should resume in a few minutes.
Match_Finished - Finished in the regular time, after extra time or after the penalty shootout.
Match_Postponed - Postponed to another day, once the new date and time is known the status will change to Not Started.
Match_Cancelled - Cancelled, match will not be played.
Match_Abandoned - Abandoned for various reasons (Bad Weather, Safety, Floodlights, Playing Staff Or Referees), Can be rescheduled or not, it depends on the competition.
Technical_Loss - Not Played.
WalkOver - Victory by forfeit or absence of competitor.
In_Progress - Used in very rare cases. It indicates a fixture in progress but the data indicating the half-time or elapsed time are not available.
